Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.summaryOfDashboard: Summary of stats, and other data

Stats.downloadMessage: Downloads in {date, select, 0 {this week} 2 {this year} 1 {this month} other {custom date}}
Stats.uploadMessage: Uploads in {date, select, 0 {this week} 2 {this year} 1 {this month} other {custom date}}

StreamersPage.title: Stremers
StreamersPage.summaryOfStreamers: List of streamers and their status

NewStreamerPage.title: New streamer
NewStreamerPage.description: Add a new streamer to your list.

EditStreamerPage.title: Edit streamer
EditStreamerPage.description: Edit the streamer's details and settings.

StreamerForm.templateDescription: Select a template to use its configuration. <important>Warning : You can not change this streamer`s download configuration after selection.</important>
StreamerForm.asTemplateDescription: Whether to use this streamer as a template for other streamers.
StreamerForm.urlDescription: Streamer`s streaming url, with following format: '{`https://www.huya.com/{name}`}' - Huya '{`https://live.douyin.com/{id}`}' - Douyin
StreamerForm.enabledRecordingDescription: Whether to enable recording for this streamer.
StreamerForm.alertOverrideDescription: Below options will override the global settings for this streamer. If you want to use the global settings, leave these fields empty.

Rclone.title: Rclone
Rclone.operationDescription: Rclone operation, such as copy, move, sync, etc.
Rclone.remoteDescription: Rclone remote name. eg: gdrive:example/, gdrive:example, etc...

Command.title: Command
Command.programDescription: Program to run, such as sh, ffmpeg, etc.

Settings.title: Settings
Settings.settingsDescription: Manage your global, platforms and appearance settings.
Settings.globalSettingsDescription: This is where you can update your global settings.
Settings.globalSettingsAlertDescription: Changing some of these settings may require a manual reboot
Settings.themeSettingsDescription: Customize the appearance of the app. Automatically switch between day and night themes.
Settings.themeSettingsFontDescription: Set the font you want to use in the application.
Settings.themeSettingsThemeDescription: Select the theme for the application.

Huya.cdnDescription: Huya primary CDN used to fetch the video stream. By default, it is set to AL. Possible values are AL, TX, HW, WS, HS, AL13, HW16, HY.
Huya.bitrateDescription: The maximum bitrate for the Huya video stream. The tool will automatically adjust the closest bitrate available for download.
Huya.partDescription: The delay between each part download retry. Optional. Default is 15 seconds.
Huya.cookieDescription: Cookies to be used for the Huya video stream. <important>Optional</important>

Douyin.qualityDescription: The quality of the Douyin video stream. Ordered from highest to lowest quality. The tool will look up for the closest quality available to selected.
Douyin.partDescription: The delay between each part download retry. Optional. Default is 3 seconds.
Douyin.cookiesDescription: The cookies used to authenticate the Douyin account. <important>__ac_nonce= and __ac_signature must be included</important>

BaseDownloadConfigs.danmuDescription: Whether to download bullet comments. Default is set to follow the global settings.
BaseDownloadConfigs.cookiesDescription: Cookies to be used for the download. Default is set to follow the global settings.
BaseDownloadConfigs.outputFolderDescription: This is the folder where the downloaded files will be saved. Default is set to follow the global settings. You can use placeholders like: '{title}' The title of the streaming.'{streamer}' The streamer name of the streaming.%yyyy The year of the streaming.%MM The month of the streaming.%dd The day of the streaming.%HH The hour of the streaming.%mm The minute of the streaming.%ss The second of the streaming.
BaseDownloadConfigs.outputFilenameDescription: This is the file name of the downloaded file. Same placeholders as output folder are available. <important>Please do not include file extension, it will be automatically added based on the below selected format.</important>
BaseDownloadConfigs.outputFormatDescription: The file extension of the downloaded file. <important>Select the appropriate video extension according your needs</important>
BaseDownloadConfigs.maxBitrateDescription: The maximum bitrate for the video stream. The tool will automatically adjust the closest bitrate available for download. Default is set to follow each platform global settings.

CallbacksConfigs.alertDescription: These actions are asynchronous to the download process and will be executed concurrently.
CallbacksConfigs.onPartedDownloadDescription: Actions to be executed when a video part is downloaded
CallbacksConfigs.onStreamEndedDescription: Actions to be executed when a streamer has ended. <important>Please make sure on parted download has finished</important>
CallbacksConfigs.newActionDescription: Create a new action callback to be triggered when a new event occurs.
CallbacksConfigs.actionTypeDescription: Type of action to be triggered.
CallbacksConfigs.actionStateDescription: Whether to enable or disable the action.

GlobalSettings.engineDescription: The engine used for the download. Defaults to FFmpeg
GlobalSettings.danmuDescription: Whether to download bullet comments. Default is set to follow the global settings.
GlobalSettings.deleteFilesDescription: Enable files deletion after download, if disabled, files will be kept in the download folder. <important>It only works when onPartedDownload or onStreamingFinished callbacks are not set.</important>
GlobalSettings.outputFolderDescription: This is the folder where the downloaded files will be saved. You can use placeholders like: '{title}' The title of the streaming.'{streamer}' The streamer name of the streaming.%yyyy The year of the streaming.%MM The month of the streaming.%dd The day of the streaming.%HH The hour of the streaming.%mm The minute of the streaming.%ss The second of the streaming.
GlobalSettings.outputFilenameDescription: This is the file name of the downloaded file. Same placeholders as output folder are available. <important>Please do not include file extension, it will be automatically added based on the below selected format.</important>
GlobalSettings.outputFormatDescription: The file extension of the downloaded file. <important>Select the appropriate video extension according your needs</important>
GlobalSettings.minPartDescription: The minimum size of a parted download. If the download size is less than this value, the download will be deleted.
GlobalSettings.maxPartDescription: The maximum size of a parted download. If the download size exceeds this value, the download will be parted. If the value is 0, it will use the default value of 2.5GB.
GlobalSettings.maxPartDurationDescription: The maximum duration of a parted download. If the download duration exceeds this value, the download will be parted. If the value is 0, it disables the maximum parted download duration. <important>It has priority over the maximum parted download size</important>
GlobalSettings.maxConcurrentDownloadDescription: The maximum number of concurrent downloads. If the number of downloads exceeds this value, the download will be queued. Default is set to 5. <important>Change this field according to your streamers count and network conditions</important>
GlobalSettings.maxConcurrentUploadDescription: The maximum number of concurrent uploads. If the number of uploads exceeds this value, the upload will be queued. Default is set to 3.
GlobalSettings.downloadRetryDelayDescription: This is the delay (in seconds) used to check if a streamer is still live after a failed download (usually encountered when the streamer goes offline or network issues). Increasing this value will reduce the number of requests to the platform. Default is set to 10 seconds.
GlobalSettings.maxDownloadRetriesDescription: The maximum number of stream download retries. If the number of retries exceeds this value, the stream session will be considered as finished. Default is set to 3.

Pagination.selectedMessage: {selectedCount, plural, =0 {no rows selected} =1 {one row selected} other {# rows selected}} {totalCount, plural, =0 {} other {of # rows}}

Upload.title: Upload list
Upload.description: Here's a list of your uploaded data. Now it only supports uploads by Rclone...

RecordsPage.title: Records page
RecordsPage.description: Here's a list of your recorded data.
